item.title: Make a decision Quickly
item.description: Q: Give an example of a time in which you had to be relatively quick in coming to a decision. [collected from 150 interview questions] Sample excellent response: This happens often in the IT industry, but one recent example was when we had a core backbone switch die. It died at the worst possible time — during exams — as they always seem to do, and I needed to get it back up and running quickly.

item.title: Steps to Follow Before Making a Decision
item.description: What steps do you follow to study a problem before making a decision. [collected from 150 interview questions] Sample excellent response: Following standard models for problem-solving and decision-making can be very helpful. Here are the steps and how they helped me solve a problem with a group project: Define the problem to be solved and decision to be made. For a project in an introductory management class, the assignment was to report on the corporate structure and financial situation of a couple of companies.
